now let's look at negative sentences I'd
never done that I hadn't done that
before I hadn't done that yet
use of yet helps explain that something
was not done according to someone's
expectations
finally let's look at time expressions
used in questions had you ever done that
had that happened before how long had

you seen her how much had you saved now
